Activity

Decide if an operation is a cabling best practice or not.

Check Yes if the statement describes a best practice or No if it does not.
1. <textformat blockindent='13'>In an effort to prevent people from tripping over cables, Charles ran the cables through the false ceiling over fluorescent lights.</textformat>
2. <textformat blockindent='13'>Yasmin labeled all cables and recorded their location as she installed them.</textformat>
3. <textformat blockindent='13'>Damon decided to follow T568A termination cabling standard for all straight-through cabling needs in his network.</textformat>

4. <textformat blockindent='13'>Samuru needed to connect a device to the network. She located a bunch of old, hand-terminated cables in a drawer. Assuming the cables were good, she selected one and connected her device.</textformat>
Correct, you have identified cabling best practices. Click Next to continue.
Incorrect. Review the cabling best practices, and try again.
